tool_description: The AI powered News Search API lets you query major search engines for relevant news based on your search parameters.
name: News Search
title: News Search

api_list.name: Trending

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Raw or HTML.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: The order to return in. Ex. Date, Relevance

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category of articles to return. Ex. Sports, Entertainment, Business, Politics, World, ScienceAndTechnology, LifeStyle, China, Education, Military, RealEstate, Society, Health, Sports_NBA, Products, US_Northeast, etc.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The preferred result language. ISO 639-1 2-letter language code.

optional_parameters.name: safeSearch
optional_parameters.description: Filter adult content. Ex. Off, Moderate, Strict.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of news articles to skip before returning.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: The number of articles to return. 100 Max. Increment offset by count to provide pagination to users.

optional_parameters.name: countryCode
optional_parameters.description: A two character country code where the results originate from.

api_list.name: Category
api_list.description: Finds news relating to specific category.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: The order to return in. Ex. Date, Relevance

optional_parameters.name: safeSearch
optional_parameters.description: Filter adult content. Ex. Off, Moderate, Strict.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category of articles to return. Ex. Sports, Entertainment, Business, Politics, World, ScienceAndTechnology, LifeStyle, China, Education, Military, RealEstate, Society, Health, Sports_NBA, Products, US_Northeast, etc.

optional_parameters.name: count

optional_parameters.name: headlineNum
